name: Super Rocket Monkey (rocketmonkeys)
description:
Ooo aa AAA ooo AAA! Embark on an epic adventure in this original Top-Down Foddian experience that will put your supreme gaming abilities to the test. Can YOU control this Rocket-powered Monkey?

Controls: 

Left Click to Move 

Use the mouse to Aim

Press Space to Use your Binoculars

Hope you all enjoy! Good Luck :)
